oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The persistent activity of Ivermectin in cattle challenged daily with Nematodes
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Wallace, D. H.
Barth, D.
Baggott, D.
Cox, J. L.
Ericsson, G. F.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: persistent nematocidal activity
ivermectin
injectable formulation
infective larvae
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: To investigate the persistent nematocidal activity of the injectable formulation of ivermectin under repeated challenge conditions, three studies were conducted in which the trial animals were administered infective larvae daily.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1996; 192
